verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:36
verses.text: The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:37
verses.text: The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:38
verses.text: And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:39
verses.text: And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan’s sister.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:40
verses.text: The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:41
verses.text: The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
